title: EmpowNetwork
author: EmpowNetwork
content: Following the popularity of S.S. Lazio Club, $LAZIO Fan Token (LAZIO) is also making waves in the crypto space. If you're interested in trading $LAZIO, this is a must-read article since there are compelling evidence showing that the Smart Money wallet isn't holding too many tokens. Probably, there will be an adjustment for Smart Money to accumulate more in the near future.Check this out  https://hackernoon.com/how-smart-money-influenced-lazios-price #Tokflow #Tokflowanalysis #Lazio

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: to be honest fan token wouldnt stop here. and if you a futures trader on binance you can actually see that football token usually tend to up even the bitcoin is down

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on October 17, 2022, 04:48:12 AMto be honest fan token wouldnt stop here. and if you a futures trader on binance you can actually see that football token usually tend to up even the bitcoin is down I think fan tokens are increasing due to upcoming olympics and they are just hit and talk of the town. Of course what tokens would boom on time like this. Probably those fan tokens related to sports. So taking a look on these fan tokens are good if you are trading with short term since they tend to be bullish.

comments.author: Ararbermas
comments.created_time: October 17, 2022, 06:56:11 AMLast edit: October 17, 2022, 10:11:06 AM by Ararbermas
comments.body: Seriously mate ive been watching this project but i don't have a trust yet because of the growth rate that seems holders are not stable and there is an manipulation since from the start.  Actually their road map is good but still not time to trust, but yeah there's a potential if they will keep promoting this token. And just my personal opinion when this will make hype surely it will never last..
